property.name: content
property.description: This is the jinja template for cdap-env.sh file
property.value:
export JAVA_HOME={{java64_home}} if [ "$JAVA_HOME" != "" ]; then JAVA_HOME=$JAVA_HOME else echo "Error: JAVA_HOME is not set." exit 1 fi
JAVA=$JAVA_HOME/bin/java
export HADOOP_HOME_WARN_SUPPRESS=1
# Set native libs PATH export JAVA_LIBRARY_PATH=${JAVA_LIBRARY_PATH}:{{hadoop_lib_home}}/native/Linux-amd64-64:{{hadoop_lib_home}}/native
export CDAP_HOME=/opt/cdap export CDAP_CONF={{cdap_conf_dir}} export LOG_DIR={{log_dir}} export PID_DIR={{pid_dir}} export MASTER_JAVA_HEAPMAX="-Xmx{{cdap_master_heapsize}}m" export OPTS="${OPTS} -Dhdp.version=${HDP_VERSION:-{{hdp_version}}}"
